metadata.title: CVE-2024-38820 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The fix for CVE-2022-22968 made disallowedFields patterns inDataBinder case insensitive. However, String.toLowerCase() has some Localedependent exceptions that could potentially result in fields not protectedas expected.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
